definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Application of physics and condensed matter physics of low-dimensi…
sentences.chinese: 應用物理專業和凝聚態物理學低維物理方向程序。

sentences.english: The largest subfield of physics today is condensed matter.
sentences.chinese: 現今物理學最大的分支學科是凝聚態物質。

sentences.english: Hot-electron effect is one of the frontier of condensed matter physics.
sentences.chinese: 熱電子效應是當今凝聚態物理學研究的前沿課題。
